text: @davidaxelrod @realDonaldTrump @POTUS We don’t want him here but @GovAbbott is a #Trump stool pigeon, so we’ll see. Our COVID19 rate is on a consistent uptick & MAGAt rallies will make matters worse. #KeepTrumpOutOfTexas.
